title: Aditya Birla Renewables raises Rs 2500 crore
description: Aditya Birla Group's renewable energy arm, Aditya Birla Renewables Limited, has raised Rs 2500 crore through non-convertible debentures. The funds will be used to expand capacity, repay debt, and for general corporate purposes. The debentures were issued with a coupon of 8.6% per annum and a tenure of three years.
